rule_sets.subdivision: - Tube or pipe fittings of stainless steel:

rules.rule: Production from non-originating materials of any heading, except that of the product (CTH) and except from forged blanks of heading 72.07; however, non-originating forged blanks of heading 72.07 may be used provided that their value does not exceed **50%** of the ex-works price (EXW) or **45%** of the free on board price (FOB) of the product.
